body.p:
B Green Ky Mch 1865
Govr Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir
Allow me to introduce my friend & family physician Dr L C Porter --
Dr P -- has business with you & any representations which he makes, you may rely upon --
I hope you may find it it in your power & consistent with your sense of duty to render him assistance

I am very truly yours
B. C. Grider
